long_description: Slip into the lightweight Cushe Dawn Patrol Slippers before heading out the door for an early morning surf session, dog walk or coffee run. You'll love their easy slip-on design and all-day comfort. Textile uppers have a breathable canvas lining to keep your feet nice and comfortable. Molded EVA outsoles with manuka honeycomb design provide traction.
short_description: Slip into the lightweight Cushe Dawn Patrol Slippers before heading out the door for an early morning surf session, dog walk or coffee run. You'll love their easy slip-on design and all-day comfort.
